quote.msg: 可唔可以講下eth 未來前景, gas 又係啲咩

前景: ETH 2.0, layer 2 solution
gas係send transaction或者用smart contract時要俾嘅交易費/礦工費
可以講多少少layer 2 solution嗎？

replies.msg:
Bitcoin同Ethereum blockchain本身係layer 1，所有on-chain transaction會受到L1特性限制 (例如block time, 每block嘅容量)
Layer 2 solution就係用各種方法將交易資料搬離L1壓縮，最後先喺L1做返紀錄，主要想慳返L1空間、交易費、交易時間

出名嘅例子有
Bitcoin: Lightning Network
Ethereum (而有token可以投資嘅): OMG, Loopring, Matic, xDai, Celer, Raiden Network

L2機制有各種取捨可以好唔同，你想technical啲可以睇睇呢條link

https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/layer-2-scaling/#:~:text=Layer%202%20is%20a%20collective,for%20certain%20types%20of%20dapps.
